alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Denton County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Krum, or near Sanger, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plano, Frisco, Denton, The Colony, Corinth, Lake Dallas, Sanger, Lake Lewisville, Little Elm, Prosper, Celina, Krum, Hickory Creek, Shady Shores, Aubrey, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Hackberry, Hebron and Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 468 and 479. Interstate 35W between mile markers 83 and 85. Interstate 35E between mile markers 457 and 466. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
